h1.style: margin-top: 0,font-size: 45px;color: #ff7b07;font-family: Arial Black, Gadget, sans-serif;text-shadow: 0px 0px 0 rgb(206,74,0),0px 1px 0 rgb(195,63,0),0px 2px 0 rgb(184,52,0),0px 3px 0 rgb(173,41,0),0px 4px 0 rgb(162,30,0),0px 5px 0 rgb(152,20,0),0px 6px 0 rgb(141,9,0),0px 7px 0 rgb(130,-2,0),0px 8px 0 rgb(119,-13,0),0px 9px 0 rgb(108,-24,0),0px 10px 0 rgb(97,-35,0),0px 11px 0 rgb(86,-46,0),0px 12px 11px rgba(105,0,0,0.6);

div.h1: Hi, my name is Mark Valentino, and I'm a web developer.
